characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a blue truck, driver of a white van
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. A blue truck is seen on the left side, moving forward. A white van is parked on the right side. The self-driving vehicle is following a large truck closely, which is moving straight ahead.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while following the large truck ahead. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the truck, ensuring no sudden braking is required.
key_objects: 1) Front: A large truck, approximately 5 meters away, moving straight ahead. 2) Left side: A blue truck, approximately 10 meters away, moving forward. 3) Right side: A white van, approximately 15 meters away, parked.
